content: 3rd chain of beg chain-4 18 v-sts rnds 14-16 work beg v-st *v-st in next v-st repeat from * around join with slip_stitch 18 v-sts round 17 chain 1 work 3 single_crochet in space of ea v-st join with slip_stitch 54 single_crochet fasten_off and weave in tails follow finishing instructions as for medium-size bag above copyright 2017 2008 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 3
